trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Larnaca
There were no other sightings in Larnaca on or around April 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWe observed two bright orange glowing objects in the sky while we were in the car. First, for 2 seconds just one UFO was present and it moved a bit lower and suddenly disappeared.Then a second UFO of the same colour and size appeared a few meters right to the previous one and it hovered straight where the previous one was. It moved at incredible speed, following a semi-circle direction and then it looked as if it was absorbed. They both disappeared. The event occured for appr. 1 minute. It's the bright unusal colour that made us notice the objects. Once I saw them I insisted that they were UFO's. I felt a bit shocked and scared because once we noticed the objects, I yelled that they looked like they were UFO's and pointed at them and immidiately the first disappeared. We lost sight of the objects as they disappeared.
